Bash(.venvScriptspython -c "
import asyncio
from helpers.utils.authentication import get_azure_credentials
from helpers.clients.fabric_client import FabricApiClient

async def get_ids\(\):
    cred = get_azure_credentials\(''test'', {}\)
    client = FabricApiClient\(cred\)
    
    # Get workspaces
    workspaces = await client.get_workspaces\(\)
    print\(''=== WORKSPACES ===''\)
    for ws in workspaces[:5]:
        print\(f""{ws.get\(''id''\)} - {ws.get\(''displayName''\)}""\)
    
    if workspaces:
        ws_id = workspaces[0][''id'']
        print\(f''\\nUsing workspace: {ws_id}''\)
        
        # Get semantic models
        models = await client.get_semantic_models\(ws_id\)
        print\(''\\n=== SEMANTIC MODELS ===''\)
        for m in models[:5]:
            print\(f""{m.get\(''id''\)} - {m.get\(''displayName''\)}""\)

asyncio.run\(get_ids\(\)\)
")

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "from tools import semantic_model; funcs = [t for t in dir\(semantic_model\) if t.startswith\(''get_''\) or t.startswith\(''list_''\) or t.startswith\(''evaluate_''\) or t.startswith\(''execute_''\) or t.startswith\(''read_''\) or t.startswith\(''set_''\)]; print\(''Tools found:''\); [print\(f''  - {f}''\) for f in funcs]")
